function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Close relationship between urban development and new or re-emerging contagious diseases","Impact":"Potential spread of contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Implementation of strict public health measures and early detection systems","Technologies":"Advanced testing and tracing technologies, public health surveillance systems","People":"Urban residents, commuters, city visitors","Owner":"Public health authorities, urban planners, government agencies"},{"Description":"Rapid means of transportation and expansion of urban sprawl contribute to the spread of contagious diseases","Impact":"Increased risk of rapid disease transmission","Mitigation":"Development of sustainable transportation systems and urban planning strategies that limit urban sprawl","Technologies":"Green transportation technologies, urban design and planning software","People":"Urban residents, commuters, city visitors","Owner":"Transportation authorities, urban planners, government agencies"},{"Description":"Connectivity between urban life and nature as a factor contributing to the spread of contagious diseases","Impact":"Potential transmission of diseases from natural habitats to urban environments","Mitigation":"Implementation of green infrastructure and biodiversity conservation measures, as well as public awareness campaigns","Technologies":"Green infrastructure technologies, biodiversity monitoring systems","People":"Urban residents, environmental conservationists, public health advocates","Owner":"Environmental organizations, public health authorities, urban planners"}]}
